app.name: CalcTax
app.description: Easily calculate registration and annual road tax for your vehicle in Belgium

home.title: CalcTax - Belgian Car Tax Calculator | Registration & Road Tax
home.description: Calculate registration tax (TMC/BIV) and annual road tax for your vehicle in Belgium for free. Compare Wallonia, Flanders and Brussels. No sign-up required, 100% free.

calculator.title: Registration and Road Tax Calculator | CalcTax Belgium
calculator.description: Instantly calculate your Belgian car taxes. TMC/BIV and annual tax for all 3 regions. Free, no account needed, no ads.

compare.title: Compare Car Taxes Between Belgian Regions | CalcTax
compare.description: Compare car taxes between Wallonia, Flanders and Brussels. Find the cheapest region for your vehicle. Instant and free comparison.

search.title: Vehicle Search | Belgian Car Database | CalcTax
search.description: Search among thousands of vehicles in our database. Find your brand, model and variant to calculate your taxes.

auth.title: Sign in | CalcTax
auth.description: Sign in with Google to save your searches and contribute to our vehicle database.

account.title: My Account | CalcTax
account.description: Manage your account, saved searches and vehicle submissions.

submit.title: Submit a Vehicle | CalcTax
submit.description: Contribute to our database by submitting a missing vehicle. Your contribution helps the community.

home.heroTitle: Calculate your car taxes in Belgium
home.heroSubtitle: Registration and annual road tax for all three regions. Official 2025 data.
home.walDesc: Registration tax and annual tax based on fiscal horsepower.
home.flaDesc: BIV based on CO₂, Euro standard and vehicle age.
home.bruDesc: Tax similar to Wallonia with specific rules for clean vehicles.
home.step1Desc: Each Belgian region has its own tax system.
home.step2Desc: Search among thousands of models or enter data manually.
home.step3Desc: Registration tax and annual road tax.

vehicle.displacementCcHelp: Alternative to fiscal HP. Use if you don't know your HP.

calculator.title: Tax calculator
calculator.subtitle: Calculate registration and annual tax for your vehicle
calculator.manualDescription: Enter your vehicle specifications if it's not in our database
calculator.catalogDescription: Search for your vehicle among available models
calculator.requiredInfoDetails: For accurate calculation in Wallonia, add CO₂ and GVW. For Flanders, add CO₂ and Euro standard.
calculator.noCatalogData: The vehicle catalog is empty. Use manual entry to calculate your taxes.
calculator.fillForm: Fill in the form to see the result
calculator.loggedInSubmissionNotice: As a logged-in user, your vehicle will be submitted to the catalog for moderation.
calculator.submissionSuccess: Vehicle submitted! A moderator will review it.
